sentences.en: A German lender succumbs to perverse incentives. Who's next?
sentences.cn: 一德国贷方受制屈服于非正当(投资)动机. 谁将步其后尘?

sentences.en: A payment made a borrower to a lender for arranging a loan.
sentences.cn: 指借款人向贷款人支付的贷款安排费用.

sentences.en: Courtesy to a major lender cannot trump core domestic interests.
sentences.cn: 对主要贷款国的谦让不能超过核心的国内利益.

sentences.en: He suspects you dropped the ball on the Lender project.
sentences.cn: 因为他很怀疑你在贷方项目搞鬼.

sentences.en: I understand that the Lender approves a loan by disbursing it.
sentences.cn: 本人理解贷款银行通过放款的方式批准贷款.

sentences.en: If your credit rating is poor the lender may refuse you credit.
sentences.cn: 如果你的信用等级不佳,贷方就可能拒绝你的贷款申请.

sentences.en: In this transaction the lender is essentially lending more money to its debtor.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,贷方会把更多的钱借给借方.

sentences.en: Is important to have a mortgage lender, until it was advance.
sentences.cn: 根本贷款人拥有重要抵押, 直到它被预付.

sentences.en: Jong - Wha Lee is landers the Manila - based lender's acting chief economist.
sentences.cn: 金正华 李是位于马尼拉的贷方银行的代理首席经济学家.

sentences.en: Several lenders are offering very attractive rates of interest at the moment.
sentences.cn: 目前有几家贷款机构贷款 利率非常优惠。

sentences.en: Shakespeare says, " Neither a borrower nor a lender be. "
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚说: “ 既不要向别人借钱,也不可借钱给别人. ”

sentences.en: Shakespeare says,'Neither a borrower nor a lender be.'
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚说: “ 既不要向人借钱,也不要借给人钱. ”

sentences.en: Shylock the Jew was a well - known money lender in Venice.
sentences.cn: 夏洛克是犹太人,在威尼斯是有名的钱庄老板.

sentences.en: The borrower must cooperate with the lender, particularly by answering correspondence.
sentences.cn: 借款人必须和贷款人合作, 尤其通过回复信函的形式.

sentences.en: Third the lender encourage the borrowers to repay the credit.
sentences.cn: 三是贷款人通过有效激励,鼓励守信的借款人.

sentences.en: Upon consent by the lender loan term may be extended.
sentences.cn: 贷款人同意的,可以展期.

trans.tran_en: a person or organization that lends money to people on condition that they pay it back
